name: AuthProvider
description: Authentication providers for sign-in and linking user accounts

name.description: Name used to identify an authentication provider

module.description: Node module that exports the required `passport` strategy

strategy.description: Name of the `passport` strategy exported by `module`

description: The authentication scheme you want to use.
This can either be one of the schemes supported by `loopback-component-passport`
or a custom scheme defined in your `<appRootDir>/authentication`

link.description: Is this authentication provider used for sign-in or to be linked to an existing (authenticated) account

json.description: When set to `true`, this provider responds with `json` data instead of redirects to `successRedirectUrl` and `failureRedirectUrl`

session.description: When set to `true`, uses `express` sessions to remember the originally requested url

disabled.description: When set to `true`, this provider is not loaded / enabled
